TopicTitle: Trying to find a mod - electrical overview

Articles.Content:
I remember having a mod years ago which gave me an overview of my electrical charge; how much is being used, and how much is being gained from energy sources, even checking solar panels by specific distances.

Recently, I remembered the mod and have a need for it now, but I can't find it anywhere on CKAN. I'm wondering if it got deleted or if I'm just getting the name wrong? Searching "electrical" and "power" didn't do anything on CKAN, but this doesn't necessarily mean that those words are absent from the mod's name.

I know this is probably a bit of a junk post, but I wasn't sure where else to post it. There didn't seem to be a dedicated thread for finding mods, so I'm sorry if this is just more busy work for the moderators.
I think you want "Dynamic Battery Storage" from CKAN. It's one of Nertea's mods and might require "Near Future Electrical" and "Near Future Electrical Core".
Maybe this?
